main event: Two individuals observed an unidentified flying object hovering over Rocky Ford Air Force Base before it proceeded north at a very high rate of speed on November 7, 1956.
interesting points: The object was stationary for a period before moving quickly,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,The object was described as having flashing lights in red, yellow, and green colors,Two observers were local civil defense patrol officers aged between 28-35,No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with flashing lights
witness description: local civil defense patrol officers aged 28-35
